data.title: Pentair Expands at Colonnade Office Tower
data.meta_description: MINNEAPOLIS-Pentair Inc. has signed a roughly 94,000-square-foot headquarters lease expansion at Colonnade office tower at 5500 Wayzata Blvd, where it previously leased 62,000 square feet.
data.text:
MINNEAPOLIS-Pentair Inc. has signed a roughly 94,000-square-foot headquarters lease expansion at Colonnade office tower at 5500 Wayzata Blvd, where it previously leased 62,000 square feet.

By GlobeSt News Hub | November 20, 2012 at 01:01 AM

MINNEAPOLIS-Pentair Inc. has signed a roughly 94,000-square-foot headquarters lease expansion at Colonnade office tower at 5500 Wayzata Blvd, where it previously leased 62,000 square feet. The company, which now leases seventh, eighth and a portion of the ninth floor, will occupy the entire sixth floor and the remaining space on the ninth floor. Other terms of the lease were not revealed.

The owner of the 16-story tower is DRA Advisors, who bought the property for $52 million a year ago. For the full story, go to Minneapolis/St. Paul Business Journal .
